creator: jmeter@binarytwo.com
text:
When you have an assertion pattern value that is longer than the space provided
to type/paste it in, after changing field focus, if you try to edit that value
at a later point, you get a scroll bar on the field that obscures the pattern
text, making it unreadable.

It would be nice to either expand the pattern field when it's being edited (ie,
make it multi-line or something) or just stop the scroll bar from appearing.
Both of those solutions would allow for long assertion patterns to be edited
through the GUI.

I think this is solved by the fix for bug 40371.
At least I doubt someone will spend the effort to make an optimal fix.
